item.name: comp Name of the current JIT compiler

trigger.expression: {str(Client)}=1
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} uses suboptimal JIT compiler

item.name: comp Accumulated time spent in compilation
gc ConcurrentMarkSweep number of collections per second
gc ConcurrentMarkSweep accumulated time spent in collection
gc Copy number of collections per second
gc Copy accumulated time spent in collection
gc MarkSweepCompact number of collections per second
gc MarkSweepCompact accumulated time spent in collection
gc ParNew number of collections per second
gc ParNew accumulated time spent in collection
gc PS MarkSweep number of collections per second
gc PS MarkSweep accumulated time spent in collection
gc PS Scavenge number of collections per second
gc PS Scavenge accumulated time spent in collection

trigger.name: 70% os Process CPU Load on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {nodata(5m)}=1
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} is not reachable

trigger.expression: {str(Server)}<>1
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} runs suboptimal VM type

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",HeapMemoryUsage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",HeapMemoryUsage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mem Heap Memory used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",NonHeapMemoryUsage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",NonHeapMemoryUsage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mem Non-Heap Memory used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=CMS Old Gen",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=CMS Old Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp CMS Old Gen used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=CMS Perm Gen",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=CMS Perm Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp CMS Perm Gen used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Code Cache",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Code Cache",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp Code Cache used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Metaspace",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Metaspace",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp Metaspace used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Perm Gen",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Perm Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp Perm Gen used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp PS Old Gen used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Perm Gen",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Perm Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp PS Perm Gen used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Tenured Gen",Usage.used].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Tenured Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp Tenured Gen used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=OperatingSystem",OpenFileDescriptorCount].last(0)}>({Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=OperatingSystem",MaxFileDescriptorCount].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% os Opened File Descriptor Count used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=ParNew",CollectionCount].last(0)}<{Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=ConcurrentMarkSweep",CollectionCount].last(0)}
trigger.name: gc Concurrent Mark Sweep in fire fighting mode on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=Copy",CollectionCount].last(0)}<{Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=MarkSweepCompact",CollectionCount].last(0)}
trigger.name: gc Mark Sweep Compact in fire fighting mode on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=PS Scavenge",CollectionCount].last(0)}<{Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=GarbageCollector,name=PS MarkSweep",CollectionCount].last(0)}
trigger.name: gc PS Mark Sweep in fire fighting mode on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",HeapMemoryUsage.committed].last(0)}={Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",HeapMemoryUsage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mem Heap Memory fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",NonHeapMemoryUsage.committed].last(0)}={Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=Memory",NonHeapMemoryUsage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mem Non-Heap Memory fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.name: mp CMS Perm Gen fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.name: mp Code Cache fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.name: mp Metaspace fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Perm Gen",Usage.committed].last(0)}={Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Perm Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mp Perm Gen fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.committed].last(0)}={Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mp PS Old Gen fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Perm Gen",Usage.committed].last(0)}={Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Perm Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}

trigger.expression: {Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Tenured Gen",Usage.committed].last(0)}={Template App Generic Java JMX:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Tenured Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}
